titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Treasury Services, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:29

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, administrative files, and copies of agreements, titles, and leases maintained by Yale Treasury Services.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of Finance and Administration

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 5-A (YRG 5-A), Records of Yale officers and offices responsible for financial and administrative functions.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted to the office of origin only.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Treasury Services, Yale University, Records (RU 896). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Treasury Services at Yale is the office responsible for valuing, acknowledging, and processing gifts to Yale; maintaining copies of all agreements, deeds, wills, and trusts; and administering property and casualty insurance and faculty mortgages and emergency loans.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, administrative files, and copies of agreements, titles, and leases maintained by Yale Treasury Services.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by record type.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Finance
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of Finance and Administration

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to office of origin only.
